trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor"></xref> events, as well as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor"> </xref> eventi, nonché il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> evento associato.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Questo delegato è utilizzato con i seguenti eventi associati.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>Questo delegato è utilizzato con i seguenti eventi indirizzati.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Questi eventi indirizzati inoltrano gli eventi associati elencati in precedenza per renderli più accessibile per il modello di elemento generale in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>Gli eventi associati e gli eventi indirizzati dell'elemento base condividono i propri dati di evento e bubbling e tunneling versioni degli eventi indirizzati anche condividere i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryCursor?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Questo può influire sulle caratteristiche gestite dell'evento nel tragitto la route dell'evento.
